title: Bloodmoon Jhin- THIS NEEDS TO HAPPEN!!!

embed.description: Here is a fan art skin I did for the LoL character Jhin for fun.(Khada Jhin is of course property of Riot Games and from League of Legends) www.artstati... Blood Moon Jhin Fanart

replies.body: haha thanks for sharing my skin I did
Damn son. Im not a jhin player but that is sickkkkk.

uh, Warring Kingdoms Jh-

{{champion:63}} :Boy if you don't get yo-
